name: Definition: "Treasurer"
text:
PART I.  GENERAL
 
Note
 
  Sections 445-1 to 445-15 designated and amended as Part I by L 1990, c 164, §28.
 
Case Notes
 
  Cited:  38 H. 433, 434 (1949).
 
     §445-1  Definition:  "Treasurer".  Whenever used in this chapter "treasurer" means the treasurer or director of finance of any county of the State. [L 1896, c 64, §2; am imp L 1909, c 151, §1; RL 1925, §1955; RL 1935, §2400; RL 1945, §7001; RL 1955, §155-1; HRS §445-1]
